title: TypEdu
content:
TypEdu started as a forum for the typedesign students of [Hannes Famira](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922074629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hannes%20Famira) at the SfG ( [Schule fuer Gestaltung](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922074629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Schule%20fuer%20Gestaltung)) Basel

[www.typEdu.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922074629/http:/www.typedu.org/)
author: andreas
